info.name: Soundcloud Cereal
info.description:
soundcloud cereal is a modern design for soundcloud inspired by the "new soundcloud" style.

A sidebar is present on the style, however can be removed easily by removing the comment that prevents the "hide sidebar" code from running at the end of the CSS file. If you need help with this, feel free to PM or comment below.

new soundcloud [https://userstyles.org/styles/143408/new-soundcloud]
^^^ soundcloud cereal uses the css from "new soundcloud" for profile pages.
info.additionalInfo:
To get the full experience, please ensure you have these fonts installed, 
or the fonts seen on previews will be defaulted to your browsers.

Arial Nova [https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/arial-nova/9ns5ct1mz7m8?activetab=pivot:overviewtab]

airbnb cereal [https://www.cufonfonts.com/font/airbnb-cereal-app]

PATCH NOTES
[V1-01] 

added fallback fonts for the site 
(sans-serif to prevent browsers from showing soundcloud in times new roman, lol)
Slightly increased width of profilemenu
fixed cutoff userlist in profile page sidebar
added additional custom options (waveform colour change, remove specific dropdown elements)
darkened waveform colour

additional options can be seen in the third section of soundcloud cereal.
